example.eg: Do we have enough money for this meal?
example.egtrans: 这顿饭我们有足够的钱买单吗？

example.eg: I pray that we always have enough to live on.
example.egtrans: 我祈祷我们一直能衣食无忧。

example.eg: He worked enough to support his family.
example.egtrans: 他工作够努力，足以养家糊口。

example.eg: It's interesting enough, but I still don't want to buy it.
example.egtrans: 确实足够有趣，不过我还是不打算买。

example.eg: Enough! I don't want to hear any more!

trans_examp.trans_cn: 够了, 行了, 别再说了
及时的, 够早的, 不晚的

example.eg: Enough is enough! If I hear you scream at your baby brother one more time, you will regret it!

trans_examp.trans_cn: 及时地, 够早地, 不晚地, 够了, 请适可而止

example.eg: "If I were you, I'd avoid mentioning her ex-husband." "Enough said!"

trans_examp.trans_cn: 无需再说了, 明白了

example.eg: "Jake and Anthea disappeared upstairs together." "Enough said!"
If that's really what you want, fair enough.
example.egtrans: 如果那确实是你想要的，那就很合理了。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 有道理，很合理，理所当然

example.eg: It isn't the best computer available, but it's good enough for my needs.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 有足够的, 有相当多的

example.eg: I can't do this job anymore. I've had enough.
example.egtrans: 我无法再继续这份工作，我受够了。

example.eg: No, I couldn't eat another thing, thank you, I've had enough to eat.
I have had enough of you!
I have had enough of that man's foul language.
Miriam had had enough of cleaning up after her thoughtless flatmates.
We have just enough supplies for ourselves. We can't afford to take on anyone else.
There is just enough sugar for my coffee tomorrow.

dsense.name: leave [sb/sth] alone, leave [sb/sth] well enough alone

example.eg: I just want to be left alone to get on with my novel.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 让…独自呆着, 别去打扰

dsense.name: leave [sb/sth] alone, leave [sb/sth] well enough alone

example.eg: She wished that the man beside her at the bar would leave her alone.
My little sister will want to come with us, like enough.
It's unfair that some people are poor and starving while others have more than enough.

dsense.name: more than enough [sth], more than enough of [sth]

example.eg: Please join us for dinner; there's more than enough food.
I was near enough to touch him!
The doctors tried everything they knew, but it was not enough to save him.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 不够的, 不足的, 太少的
不够好的, 不尽如人意的
奇怪的是, 让人惊讶的是

example.eg: I see albino squirrels often enough.  They're not all that rare.
My daughter visits often enough, she just doesn't stay long.
You're only 15, you're not old enough to have your own credit card!
You'll be back in town soon enough.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 不久, 一会, 很快

example.eg: Sure enough, the stray cat appears when it's time for supper.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 肯定，毫无疑问, 果然

example.eg: The police were sure enough that whoever had killed Brown had also murdered Wilkins.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 肯定，毫无疑问, 果然

example.eg: The team played well enough to have deserved at least a draw.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 还不错，还可以, 相当，非常

example.eg: I speak French well enough, but I couldn't pass for a native speaker.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 还不错，还可以, 相当，非常
